Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface MeterHistoryRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<MeterHistory>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MeterHistory,Integer>
@Repository public interface MeterHistoryRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MeterHistory,Integer>
This interface represents the histories of meter repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on histories of meter entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createMeterHistory

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createMeterHistory(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) int createMeterHistory(LocalDate date, float value, String meterId)
      Creates a meter history entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the meter reading.
      value - The value of the meter reading.
      meterId - The ID of the meter associated with the reading.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created meter history entry.

    • getMeterHistoryByMeterId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getMeterHistoryByMeterId(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<MeterHistory> getMeterHistoryByMeterId(String meterId, int offset, int limit, String columnName, String order)
      Retrieves meter history entries from the database by meter ID with pagination and sorting.
      Parameters:
      meterId - The ID of the meter.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of entries to retrieve.
      columnName - The name of the column for sorting.
      order - The sorting order (ASC or DESC).
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MeterHistory objects associated with the specified meter ID, paginated and sorted.

    • getMeterHistoryByMeterIdUsingDate

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getMeterHistoryByMeterIdUsingDate(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<MeterHistory> getMeterHistoryByMeterIdUsingDate(String meterId, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves meter history entries from the database by meter ID and date range.
      Parameters:
      meterId - The ID of the meter.
      startDate - The start date of the date range.
      endDate - The end date of the date range.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of MeterHistory objects associated with the specified meter ID and date range.

    • countMeterHistoryByMeterId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countMeterHistoryByMeterId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countMeterHistoryByMeterId(String meterId)
      Counts the number of meter history entries associated with a specific meter.
      Parameters:
      meterId - The ID of the meter.
      Returns:
      The total number of meter history entries associated with the specified meter.

    • updateMeterHistory

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateMeterHistory(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) void updateMeterHistory(int id, LocalDate date, float value)
      Updates the details of a meter history entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meter history entry to update.
      date - The updated date of the meter reading.
      value - The updated value of the meter reading.

    • deleteMeterHistoryById

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteMeterHistoryById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteMeterHistoryById(int id)
      Deletes a meter history entry from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meter history entry to delete.
